name: The Bee and Me
description:
I'm challenging myself to make a new game every month throughout 2019. I went back to Bitsy for this month, and doodled around bees and my relationship to them. I also really enjoyed the cute new exits in the updated version of Bitsy!

This game is a very late non- entry for the monthly Bitsy jam, which had the theme of bees: https://itch.io/jam/bees-bitsy
